loans.use: to pay for the title to his land.

loans.name: Aida

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 3 filhos todos maiores, vive na casa própria e não sustenta mais ninguém.  
É comerciante e modista, vende produtos alimentares e costura para fora. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (farinha, arroz, óleo, feijão, e outros), para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria e adquirir tecidos para a sua actividade.
No futuro deseja fazer crescer o seu negócio e garantir a formação profissional dos seus filhos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos suficientes para desenvolver mais nos negócios.
texts.en: Aida is single and is the mother of three adult children.  She lives in her own home and doesn't support anyone else.  She owns a business selling food products and sewing.  She will use this loan to buy products (flour, rice, oil, beans, etc.) to increase her quantity of merchandise and to acquire fabric for her work.  In the future, she hopes to grow her business and to guarantee the professional formation of her children.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenge is the lack of sufficient funds to develop her business more.

loans.use: to buy products (flour, rice, beans, etc.) to increase her quantity of merchandise.

loans.name: Mark

texts.en: In 2010, Gladis and her husband, Mark, started L&G Enterprises to provide janitorial services to residential homes in Montgomery County, Maryland. The couple started their business with their savings. The company has been growing quickly and the owners are in need of new funds to support the company’s growth. Gladis and Mark are proud of the fact that their company employs three people. They look forward to hiring more employees in the near future. They also plan to expand their services to include commercial buildings. Gladis and Mark have been married for over eight years. Gladis is originally from Peru and Mark is from the States.

loans.use: upgrade and buy new equipment for their janitorial services business in Montgomery County, Maryland.

loans.name: Dolorosa

texts.en:
Dolorosa is a 57-year-old married woman with four children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Dolorosa has a motorized tricycle transport business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 25000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase spare parts for the maintenance of her tricycle.

Dolorosa has been in this business for 7 years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for the maintenance of her tricycle.

loans.name: Epiphania

texts.en:
Epiphania is a 29-year-old woman from the Bugesera District in the Eastern Province of Rwanda. 

She is seeking an additional loan of $50 to purchase 10 rechargeable LED lights, which she will resell to people without electricity in her village. Every week or so, these customers will return to her to have their lights recharged for just $0.20. 

Epiphania started selling lights in May 2012, and she has sold 180 lights to date, providing clean energy to 850 people. 

She is also a shopkeeper and will reinvest the money she makes into expanding her other business to earn more money for herself, her husband Jean, and their 4 children.

loans.use: to buy 10 low-cost LED lights to resell to rural households without electricity.

loans.name: Khalid

texts.en:
Khalid is 39-year-old married man and has 8 children who live together in Sana`a, Yemen. He is kind man who offers great opportunities for students. He is a teacher who gets a low salary. He is not as interested in getting money as he is in focusing on educating students. He thinks this career serves society. 

He lives with his family in a bad situation and he intends to buy construction supplies to use for his a small house. Therefore, he applied for a loan of 300,000 YER from AMB. He hopes to improve his living standards with this loan.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies to use for his small house.

loans.name: Gerard H.'s Group

texts.en:
Pictured above are teachers of a secondary school located in Kenema, a city in eastern Sierra Leone. This group of hard-working and dedicated teachers has come to SMT, a partner of Kiva based in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone, to request a loan of 16,600,000 Sierra Leonean Leones (SLL) for the entire group. With the help of this loan, these people can meet their immediate financial challenges and at the end of each month, they can easily repay the loan, using their salaries. It is their school’s bursar who is directly responsible for doing the deductions and making the repayments on their behalf.

Jestina is the featured leader of this group. The 43-year-old is a native of Kenema city. She is a widow and has six children who are attending secondary schools. Jestina has been a school teacher for 10 years. She plans to use her part of the loan in order to buy house-building materials, like iron, corrugated zinc, sand, nails, rods, etc., for the construction of a dwelling house.

loans.use: to buy house-building materials, like iron, corrugated zinc, sand, nails, rods, etc., for the construction of a dwelling house.

loans.name: Asia Group

texts.en: This group is called Asia. It is made up of four women, from Hodeida, Yemen. They are hardworking and enterprising women. They took a loan of 100,000 YER. Rashida is the group's leader. She is 19 years old, married and has two children. She has had a business selling new perfumes and incense for two years. One of Rashida's goals is to continue to grow her business. Since she has professional experience in this field, she attracted more customers, which helped her husband to continue successfully running and made the business more profitable. She is using her share of the loan to invest in her business, by buying more perfumes and incense and reselling them to her customers. This loan will allow her to strengthen her business so that she can increase her revenue. She hopes to earn large profits so that she can improve her savings in order to obtain a big loan and further expand her business.

loans.use: to invest in her business, by buying more perfumes and incense and reselling them to her customers.

loans.name: Adrianne

texts.en: Adrianne has loved working with hair since high school, when she would spend hours coloring her hair with her best friend. Her father encouraged her to pursue her passion and start her own business. In 2008, she opened The Lab A Salon with a group of her hairstylist friends in the redeveloped, urban-chic neighborhood of North Park in San Diego. Adrianne envisioned a clean, simple and elegant salon offering a relaxing environment while still communicating a modern, trendy vibe. Since opening, The Lab has grown into a bustling business. Adrianne has a team of 18 employees and contractors working at her shop and it continues to grow. Her innovative team can create your ideal style by providing experienced advice, as well as executing haircut and color services that range from classic and beautiful to edgy and contemporary. Adrianne is taking out a $10,000 Kiva loan to perform much needed upgrades to her salon. Lighting has been a constant issue in her shop, as clients have a hard time seeing the outcome of their stylist’s hard work. This loan will be used towards installing new lights as well as upgrading the front desk and other equipment. With her business thriving, Adrianne hopes to soon open a second location and pass on what her father gave her by encouraging other young stylists to open their own businesses. Visit The Lab A Salon online at: http://thelabasalon.com

loans.use: to install new lights, upgrade the front desk and purchase new equipment.

loans.name: Nilton Sheling

texts.es:
Nilton es un hombre de 49 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Parcona con sus tres hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Nilton no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Agronomía que deseaba, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol y en algunas ocasiones cocina unos riquísimos Chicharrones de Cerdo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Nilton se dedica a la agricultura, él tiene una pequeña parcela donde cultiva maíz, el trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por su experiencia y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Nilton se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos para el abono y riego de su cultivo, de esta manera Nilton podrá preparar su cultivo para que desarrolle adecuadamente y con ello desea obtener una buena cosecha, así pues Nilton seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener más parcelas y ampliar sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Nilton is a 49-year old man.  He lives in the city of Ica in the Parcona District.  He lives with his three children, who he loves very much and who are his reason for being.  Nilton is a very friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic person.  He dedicates all his effort toward getting his family ahead.  Unfortunately, due to his family's low income and his needing to work from a very young age, Nilton wasn't able to study the professional career of Agronomy that he wanted to.  In his free time, Nilton likes to play soccer and sometimes cook some delicious "chicharrones de cerdo" (pork rinds) to share with his family. 
On his own initiative and with a lot of hard-work and dedication, Nilton makes his living farming.  He has a small plot of land where he grows corn.  He works every day from very early in the morning for about twelve hours.  Nilton believes that he is doing well because of his experience and his friendly treatment of others. 
Nilton is very grateful for the Kiva lenders, as thanks to the help they have provided, he will be able to cover the costs of compost and irrigation for his crops.  Because of this, Nilton will be able to prepare his plants to develop sufficiently and and get a good harvest from them.  And then Nilton will keep working and putting forth the effort to make his dream come true; to have more parcels of land and expand his crop.

loans.use: to cover the costs of compost and irrigation for his crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase merchandise for his grocery store.

loans.name: Julian

texts.es:
Julian es un hombre de 37 años, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Imperial con su pequeño hijo, a quien ama y es su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su pequeño, ya que Julian es padre y madre para él; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Mecánica, en sus ratos libres le gusta dedicar un poco de tiempo a la lectura y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísimo Ceviche para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Julian trabaja como ayudante en una ladrillera de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Julian se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que desea reforzar las paredes de quincha de su casa con materiales mas resistentes y adecuados, de esta manera Julian podrá brindar mayor seguridad y bienestar para su familia, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de terminar la construcción de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Julian, 37, lives in the city of Cañete, in the district of Imperial, with his young son whom he loves and is his principal reason for living. He is friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic. He works hard to make progress for his son, since Julian is both father and mother to him. Unfortunately, due to lack of money and the need to work from a young age, he wasn't able to study as a professional mechanic. In his free time he likes to spend some time reading and occasionally makes a delicious ceviche to share with his family.

By his own initiative, with a lot of dedication and hard work, Julian became an assistant in the brick-making factory in his city. He works eery day for around 10 hours and things it's going well because of his dedication and the friendly manner in which he treats others.

Julian is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help he will be able to make improvements to his home. He wants to reinforce the clay walls with materials that are more resistant and adequate. Through this, Julian will be able to give greater security and well-being to his family. He will continue working and making the effort to achieve his great dream of finishing construction on his home.

loans.use: to make improvements to his home.

loans.name: Esteban

texts.es:
El Sr. Esteban es comerciante se dedica a la compra y venta de todo tipo de productos y comestible en su barrio de la ciudad de Pilar ya que tiene una pequeña despensa, está casado y tiene una hija, su señora  le ayuda en el negocio ya que realiza ventas al por mayor y menor de sus productos.
Es una persona muy trabajadora, hace más de 10 años que tiene su negocio y cuenta que tiene muy buena clientela ya que siempre ofrece a sus clientes buena variedad y calidad de sus productos, es por eso que le está yendo muy bien.
Solicita el crédito para invertir en su negocio ya que quiere poder surtirlo con comestibles, como ser verduras, frutas, fideos, arroz, azúcar y demás. Agradece por esta oportunidad que le está dando la fundación y también Kiva.
texts.en:
Sr. Esteban is a shop-owner who makes his living buying and selling all kinds of food stuffs.  He has a small grocery store located in his neighborhood in the city of Pilar.  Sr. Esteban is married and has one daughter.  His wife helps him with the business, as they sell both whole-sale and retail products. 
Sr. Esteban is a very hard-working person.  He has had his business for more than ten years.  He says that he has a very good clientele because he always offers his customers a good variety and good quality in his products.  That is why business is going so well for him. 
Sr. Esteban is requesting the loan in order to invest in his business.  He wants to stock up with groceries like vegetables, fruit, noodles, rice, sugar and other items.  He is grateful for the opportunity that is being given him by the Foundation and by also by Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, fruit, noodles, rice, sugar and other items.

loans.name: Marisol

texts.es:
Marisol es una mujer de 47 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con sus 6 hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, ya que ella es padre y madre para sus hijos; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Marisol no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Secretariado, en sus ratos libres le gusta cocinar deliciosos postres y comidas típicas de su región.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Marisol trabaja brindando servicios de limpieza en una empresa hotelera de su ciudad, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por su esfuerzo y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Marisol se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que esta es de madera, calaminas y piso de tierra, de esta manera al mejorarla Marisol podrá brindar mayor seguridad y bienestar para su familia, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de terminar la construcción de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Marisol is a 47 year old woman who lives in the city of Pucallpa with her 6 children, whom she loves and are the main reason for her life.  She is a very kind, hard-working, and enthusiastic person, who dedicates all of her efforts to providing for her family, since she must be father and mother to her children.  Unfortunately, due to lack of economic resources and by necessity she has had to work since she was very young and so she couldn't study a professional career as a secretary.  In her spare time, she enjoys cooking delicious desserts and typical foods from her region.  

By her own initiative, and with a lot of hard work and dedication, Marisol works offering cleaning services in a hotel in her city.  She works everyday for approximately 8 hours and believes that it is going well because of her effort and the kind treatment she gives to others.  

Marisol is very grateful to the KIVA lenders, since thanks to the help being offered, she will be able to complete the improvement of her home, since it is made of wood and corrugated zinc, and has a dirt floor.  By improving her home, Marisol will be able to provide better security and well-being for her family, so she will continue working hard and striving to complete her great dream of finishing the construction of her home.

loans.use: to improve her home.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es:
Fernando es un hombre de 45 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Santiago con su esposa y sus 2 pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Fernando no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, en sus ratos libres le gusta distraerse viendo televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina unos riquísimos Chicharrones para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Fernando trabaja como personal de limpieza en una empresa municipal de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su esfuerzo y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Fernando se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos educativos de sus hijos, como pago de matrícula, compra de uniformes y útiles escolares, de esta manera sus hijos podrán contar con los materiales necesarios para cursar adecuadamente sus estudios, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de poder brindarles una buena educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Fernando, 45, lives in the city of Ica, in the district of Santiago, with his wife and two young children whom he loves and who are his main reason for living. He is friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic. Together with his wife he puts all of his effort into getting his family ahead. Unfortunately, due to lack of money and the need to work from a young age, Fernando wasn't able to study a professional career. In his free time he likes to distract himself by watching television. On occasion he cooks delicious chicharrones [fried pork rinds] to share with his family.

By his own initiative, with a lot of tenacity and dedication, Fernando works as a janitor in a local business in his city. He works every day for around 10 hours and believes it's going well because of his effort and the friendly manner in which he treats others.

Fernando is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help he will be able to cover the costs of education for his children, such as school entrance fees, uniforms and school supplies. This way his children will have the materials they need to adequately attend their classes. He will continue working and making an effort to achieve his dream of giving his children a good education.

loans.use: to cover his children's education expenses.

loans.name: San Antonio Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado San Antonio está en su ciclo número 6°  del programa de comité de mujeres, ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde  se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, solo una persona, quien ve como una gran oportunidad de progreso estar dentro del comité.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Tomasa, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel dos.  Ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras en el mercado, lo cual hace haga frío o calor, o llueva. Es una persona muy trabajadora que se esfuerza por salir adelante y tratar de ayudar a su familia por medio de su trabajo. Ella quiere seguir trabajando y creciendo, es por eso que se esfuerza.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de frutas y también de verduras, ya que así tendrá productos frescos y podrá seguir con sus ventas.
texts.en:
The group called San Antonio  is in their 6th cycle with the Women's Committee program. They are part of the poverty elimination survey, and have one person who is below the poverty line. She sees being in the group as a great opportunity for progress. 

Tomasa is one of the members of the group. In her last survey she was at poverty level two. She sells fruits and vegetables in the market,  whether it's hot, cold or raining. She is hardworking and makes an effort to get ahead and help her family through her work. She wants to keep working and growing, which is why she makes the effort.

She asks for a loan to to invest in the purchase of fruits as well as vegetables so that she will have fresh products and can keep up her sales.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Victoria Clorinda

texts.es:
Victoria es una mujer de 43 años, vive en la ciudad de Camaná, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por salir adelante; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Victoria no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver películas y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Chupe de Camarones para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Victoria trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de frituras, ella cuenta con un pequeño carrito sanguchero, donde vende hamburguesas, salchipapas, salchipollos y otros, Victoria trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 7 horas y cree que le va bien por su buena sazón y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Victoria se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de materiales de construcción para el mejoramiento de su vivienda, de esta manera Victoria podrá contar con mayor seguridad y bienestar, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de comprar otro carrito sanguchero y así desea poco a poco ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
Victoria is a 43-year old woman.  She lives in the city of Camaná.  She is a very friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic person who puts all her effort toward getting ahead.  Unfortunately, because of her family's low income and her need to work from a very young age, Victoria wasn't able to study a profession, but she would have liked to.  In her free time, she likes to watch movies and at times to prepare a delicious "chupe de camarones" (shrimp stew) to share with her family.
Of her own initiative, and with a lot of hard work and dedication, Victoria runs a small business selling fried foods.  She has a small food cart where she sells hamburgers, hot dogs and fries, chicken and fries and other items.  Victoria works every day for about seven hours.  She believes that business is going well for her because of her food's good flavor and her friendly customer service. 
Victoria is very grateful for the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the help they have provided her, she will be able to purchase the construction materials she needs to make improvements to her home.  And then Victoria will have a greater sense of security and well-being.  She will continue working and putting for the effort needed to achieve her greatest dream: to purchase another food cart and, little by little, expand her business.

loans.use: to make improvements to her home.

loans.name: Hamza

texts.en:
Hamza is a 31-year-old man who lives in Sana`a, Yemen. He is married and has two children. He works hard to provide a good life for his family. He has been working in the business of phone accessories for 5 years. His dad helped Hamza start up the business and has been his motivation to work hard in it. 

Hamza took a loan of 500,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase phone accessories to meet the demands of his clientele, which has expanded. As a result, his customers will find his store even more attractive, which will increase sales considerably.

loans.use: to purchase more phone accessories to meet the demands of his clientele.

loans.name: Al-Dhia Group

texts.en: Aldhia is a group that consists of four ladies who live in Sana`a, Yemen. They are women who work hard in order to increase their income. Fatehia is a 51-year-old married woman who lives with her eight children in poor conditions in Sana`a, Yemen. She is a housewife who intends to buy construction supplies to use for her house. She said the amount she had is not enough to buy what she needs. Therefore, she requested for a loan of 60,000 YER from AMB to buy construction supplies for rebuilding her bathroom. She hopes to improve her living standards and to buy home appliances.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies for rebuilding her bathroom.

loans.name: Titus

texts.en:
Titus is a 44-year-old married man with 6 children living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He is a farmer but also earns a monthly salary as a civil servant. Like all fathers, he hopes to educate his children up to the University level and set up sustainable income generating activities to secure their future. 

Unpredictable weather changes and low salary are his major challenges, while his dream is to become a leading farmer in the region. Titus intends to use the loan to buy fertilizers and mulch for his banana plantation.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and mulch for his banana plantation.

loans.name: Micheal

texts.en: Micheal is a married man living in Bundibugyo, Uganda.  He is a teacher by profession working eight hours a day.  He is a very ambitious man whose dream is to become a school principal after upgrading his studies.  Inadequate capital and inflation pose a challenge in achieving his dream.  However, he intends to educate his children and buy land for farming.  Micheal intends to use this loan to pay school fees for himself.

loans.use: to pay school fees for himself

loans.name: Manuel

texts.en:
Manuel is married and has four children. He is 68 years old and lives in Tukuran. Manuel operates a service-based business providing transportation services to earn a living. He has been doing this for 10 years and every month he earns 10,000 PHP from this work. He has requested a loan of 20,000 PHP to purchase spare vehicle parts and accessories. 

Manuel been a member of GDMPC since 2009. In the future, Manuel hopes to finish the education of his children and to double the income from his business.

loans.use: buy spare parts and accessories for his vehicle

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is 51 years old and is married with three children. To make a living, Nenita is engaged in a retailing business. She has been in this business for five years. She usually earns about a minimum of PHP 450 a day. 

Nenita wants to expand and re-stock her sari-sari store but she lacks the necessary capital. For that purpose, Nenita is asking for a loan in the amount of PHP 50,000 to purchase grocery items such as canned goods, noodles, beverages and condiments to sell.  Nenita hopes to grow her business.

loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Felecitas

texts.en:
Felecitas is 50 years old, married and has 6 children. She lives in Tukuran, Zambanga Del Sur. She owns and operates a farm, planting and harvesting vegetables for sale in the local community to earn a living. She has been in her business for over 10 years and earns 30,000 PHP every month. 

Felecitas joined GDMPC in 2010.  Now she has requested a loan of 40,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure. Her hopes and dreams is to have a better future and improves her living situation.

loans.use: buy fertilizer

loans.name: Maris

texts.en:
Maris is from Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 27, married and has two children. For 7 years, she has owned and operated a specialized general store where she earns 15,000 PHP a month. 

In 2008, Maris Stella joined GDMPC. Maris is now requesting a new loan of 24,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase new items such as Milo, shampoo, soaps, canned goods, eggs and dried fish. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Baylagmaa

texts.en:
Baylagmaa, 38 years old, lives with her mother and son in Darkhan, the second largest city in Mongolia. She worked at a photographic studio from 2001 to 2010. During her employment period, she has held numerous positions such as assistant, photographer and studio manager. In 2010, she began to operate her own photography studio, which penetrated the market successfully and attracted quite numerous customers. 

Baylagmaa is requesting a loan of 1500000 MNT to purchase brand new camera. Her previous camera has been deteriorating over three years so she wants to replace her old one with a new one. As a result, she can continue to render her photography service to local people and invest in her son's future university education. This borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: buy a camera

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita is 61 years old, married and has 3 children. She lives in Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur. She owns and manages her retail store in the local community to earn a living. She has been in her business for over 9 years and earns 3,000 PHP every month. 

Anita joined in GDMPC in 2010.  Now she has requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase additional products to sell like shampoo, soap, sugar and coffee. Her hope and dream is to improve her living situation.

loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
Teresa es una mujer de 53 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con su esposo y sus 7 hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su esposo dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, en sus ratos libres le gusta escuchar música y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Lomo Saltado para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Teresa trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por la variedad de productos y por el trato amable que ofrece a sus clientes.
Teresa se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mayor cantidad y variedad de abarrotes, así como bebidas y golosinas, de esta manera Teresa tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido y podrá atender a mas clientes, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ver a sus convertidos en buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Teresa is a 53-year-old woman, lives in the city of Nazca with her husband and 7 children, who she loves and are her principle reason in life. She is a very friendly, hard-working, and enthusiastic person, who together with her husband puts forth all of her efforts to move her family forward. Unfortunately due to lack of economic resources and due to necessity, she had to work starting at a very young age and could not study toward a professional career. In her free moments she likes to listen to music. On some occasions she cooks a delicious Lomo Saltado (Peruvian dish) to share with her family. 

By her initiative, and with much tenacity and dedication, Teresa works in her small business selling groceries. She works every day for approximately 8 hours a day and believes that it is going well for her due to the variety of products and the kind manner in which she treats customers. 

Teresa is very thankful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to the help given, she will be able to purchase an increased quantity and variety of groceries, like drinks and candy. In this way, Teresa will have a better stocked business and will be able to tend to more customers. She will continue working and putting forth the effort to achieve her big dream of seeing her children in good careers.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Nelson Enrique

texts.es: El joven Nelson de 34 años de edad, es soltero padre de dos hijos, labora como operador para una empresa privada, trabaja desde la edad de 18 años, su principal meta es continuar estudiando para ser un profesional de mucho éxito, en la actualidad es Ing. en computación, el está solicitando el crédito para poder pagar un curso de redes, esto le permitirá ampliar mas sus conocimientos en su formación, para poder aspirar a un mejor empleo y así ayudar a sus hijos y familia.
texts.en: Nelson is 34 years old and the single parent of two children. He works as an operator for a private company. He has worked since the age of 18. His principle goal is to continue studying in order to be a professional of much success. Currently he is a computer engineer. He is requesting the loan in order to be able to pay for a network course. This will allow him to increase his knowledge and education, to be able to aspire to a better job and in that way help his children and family.

loans.use: to pay for a network course.

loans.name: Arafat

texts.en:
Arafat is a 29-year-old man. He is married and has 2 children who live together in Ibb, Yemen. He studied in a vocational institute. He is a merchant whose business is an oil and tire repairing service store since 2002. He is very experienced in his business and knows how to offering high quality services to his customers. 

He needed a way to survive and generate income on his own, so he decided to start his own tire repair business. His old electric car tire pump is not working well and he intends to buy a new one, but doesn`t have enough money. So he applied for a youth loan of 200,000 YER from AMB to buy a new electric car tire pump to generate income. In the future, he wishes to expand his business to increase his profit.

loans.use: to buy an electric car tire pump to generate income.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en:
Lilian is 58 years old and married with one child.   Lilian works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines.

Lilian has requested a PHP 16000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell.  She has been in this business for 26 years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Lilian aspires to save money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: buy groceries to resell

loans.name: Francisco

texts.en:
Francisco is 56 years old. He lives in the village of Centro 1 in San Guillermo. Francisco devoted himself in his sari-sari store business.  He has been in this business for one year. 

Right now, Francisco is asking a loan in the amount of PHP 13,000 to buy condiments, noodles, canned goods and beverage to sell. He hopes that he can get the amount he requested to further develop his business.

loans.use: restock his store

loans.name: Hermenigilda

texts.en:
As a married parent of 3 children, Hermenigilda works hard to support her family.

She has a tricycle transport business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening.  Hermenigilda is borrowing PHP 23000 through NWTF to buy spare parts for her tricycle transport.

Hermenigilda has been sustaining her business activities through her past 20 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: buy spare parts for her tricycle transport

loans.name: Milagros Luisa

texts.es:
Milagros es una mujer de 21 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Parcona con sus padres y hermanos, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Milagros no ha podido estudiar la carrera profesional de Educación, pero le gustaría poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver películas y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Milagros trabaja como obrera de campo en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, adicionalmente tiene una mototaxi, la cual alquila a choferes para que brinden servicios de transporte, Milagros trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por su responsabilidad y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás. 
Milagros se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una refrigerado, la cual les servirá de mucho para poder conservar sus alimentos y bebidas en mejor estado, de esta manera ella y su familia contarán con mayor bienestar, así pues Milagros seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de poder estudiar una carrera profesional y desea convertirse en una empresaria de éxito.
texts.en:
Milagros is a 21-year old woman.  She is single and lives in the city of Ica, Parcona District, with her parents and siblings.  She is a very friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic person.  She dedicates all her effort toward getting her family ahead.  Unfortunately, due to a lack of money and the need to work, Milagros has not been able to study the professional career of Education, but she would like to do so.  In her free time, Milagros likes to watch movies and at times to prepare a delicious "arroz con pollo" (chicken and rice) to share with her family. 
Of her own initiative and with a lot of hard work and dedication, Milagros works as a field worker in a city farm.  Additionally, she has a "mototaxi" (motor bike taxi) which she rents to drivers who offer transportation services.  Milagros works every day for about twelve hours.  She believes that she does well because of her sense of responsibility and her friendly treatment of others. 
Milagros is very grateful for the Kiva lenders, as thanks to the help they have provided, she will be able to purchase a refrigerator.  The refrigerator will be a big help to her family in preserving their food and drinks in better condition.  Milagros will keep working and putting forth the effort needed to make her greatest dream come true: to study a professional career and to become a successful businesswomen.

loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a mototaxi

loans.name: Glenis

texts.es:
Doña Glenis tiene 48 años de edad, es madre soltera con 3 hijos, y vive con uno de ellos en el municipio de Azacualpa, Santa Barbara.
Doña Glenis tiene desde hace 3 años un negocio de venta de comida.ofrece baleadas, pollos con tajada, almuerzos etc. Este negocio ha sido su fuente de ingreso que le ha ayudado siendo una madre sola a mantener sus hijos.las ventas las hace en sus casa hasta donde llegan los clientes a comprar, dice que hasta el momento le ha ido bien. Ella ha solictado 2 creditos con Odef, Ahora necesita otro de 9000 lempiras para compra de insumos que necesita para elaborar las comidas como (condimentos, carnes, arroz, frijoles, harina, verduras etc.)esta inversion le ayudara y aumentara sus ventas. La meta que tiene es ampliar el local para darle mejor comodidad a los clientes.
texts.en: Glenis, 48, is a single mother with 3 children. She lives with one of them in Azacualpa municipality, Santa Barbara. For three years, Glenis has had a food business. She sells baleadas, chicken with plantains, lunches, etc. This business has been a helpful source of income for her, being a single mother. She sells from her home. Her customers come there to buy. She says that up until now things have gone well for her. She has applied for two loans with Odef. Now she needs another 9,000 lempiras to buy the necessary ingredients to make the dishes, such as condiments, meat, rice, beans, flour, vegetables, etc. This investment will help her and increase her sales. Her goal is to expand her establishment to make it more comfortable for her customers.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make food to sell.

loans.name: Eudom Edu

texts.es:
Eudom es un hombre de 29 años, vive en la ciudad de Pisco con su esposa y sus dos pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Eudom no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Economía, en sus ratos libres le gusta cocinar un riquísimo Arroz con Mariscos para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Eudom trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de frutas y verduras, el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Eudom se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de un pequeño puesto de ventas en el mercado central de su ciudad, de esta manera Eudon podrá seguir trabajando y atendiendo a mas clientes, con el deseo de lograr su gran sueño de convertirse en un gran empresario.
texts.en:
Eudom is 29 years old and lives in the city of Pisco with his wife and two young children, whom he loves. They are the main reason of his life. He is a very kind person, hard-working and enthusiastic. With his wife, they devote all their efforts to get their family ahead. Unfortunately, due to the lack of financial resources and the need to work since very young, Eudom couldn't study the career of Economics. In his spare time, he likes to cook delicious rice with seafood to share with his family. 

On his own initiative, with much effort and dedication, Eudom works in his small business selling fruits and vegetables. He works every day for about ten hours. He believes he is doing well because of the good prices and the kind treatment he gives to his customers.

Eudom is very grateful to Kiva lenders, because thanks to the help provided he will be able to buy a small food stall in the central market of his city. This way, Eudom will be able to keep working and serving more customers with the desire to achieve his big dream of becoming a great entrepreneur.

loans.use: to buy a food stall

loans.name: Milciades

texts.es:
Milciades es un hombre de 38 años, vive en la ciudad de Pisco con su esposa y sus dos pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Milciades no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Administración, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver partidos de futbol y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Seco a la Norteña para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Miliciades trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de papas peladas, las cuales vende a diversas pollerías de su ciudad, Milciades trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Milciades se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de un pequeño puesto de ventas en el mercado central de su ciudad, de esta manera Milciades podrá contar un local fijo donde pueda seguir vendiendo sus papas y sus clientes lo puedan ubicar, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su propia vivienda.
texts.en:
Miliciades is 38 years old and lives in the city of Pisco with his wife and two young children, whom he loves. They are the main reason of his life. He is a very kind person, hard-working and enthusiastic. With his wife, they devote all their efforts to get their family ahead. Unfortunately, due to the lack of financial resources and the need to work since very young, Miliciades couldn't study the career of Administration. In his spare time, he likes to watch soccer games and sometimes he cooks delicious "Seco a la Norteña" to share with his family.

On his own initiative, with much effort and dedication, Miliciades works in his small business selling peeled potatoes, which he sells to a variety of chicken restaurants in his city. Miliciades works every day for about eight hours. He believes he is doing well because of the good prices and the kind treatment he gives to his customers.

Miliciades is very grateful to Kiva lenders, because thanks to the help provided he will be able to buy a small food stall in the central market of his city. This way, Miliciades will have a fixed location where he can keep selling potatoes and his customers can locate him. He will keep working and striving to achieve his dream of having his own home.

loans.use: to buy a food stall.

loans.name: Cesar Ricardo

texts.es:
Cesar es un hombre de 58 años, vive en la ciudad de Pisco con su esposa y sus tres hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Cesar no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Contabilidad, en sus ratos libres le gusta seguir trabajando y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz Chaufa para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Cesar trabaja como chofer de mototaxi, brindando servicios de transporte en su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por su responsabilidad y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Cesar se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la refacción y el mantenimiento general que necesita su mototaxi, de esta manera Cesar contara con su herramienta de trabajo en mejores condiciones y podrá seguir brindando sus servicios, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su propio auto.
texts.en:
Cesar is 58 years old and lives in the city of Pisco with his wife and three children, whom he loves. They are the main reason of his life. He is a very kind person, hard-working and enthusiastic. With his wife, they devote all their efforts to get their family ahead. Unfortunately, due to the lack of financial resources and the need to work since very young, Cesar couldn't study the career of Accounting. In his spare time, he likes to keep working and sometimes he cooks delicious "Arroz Chaufa" to share with his family.

On his own initiative, with much effort and dedication, Cesar works as a motorcycle taxi driver, providing transport services in his city. He works every day for about 12 hours. He believes he is doing well due to his responsibility and the kind treatment he gives to others.

Cesar is very grateful to Kiva lenders, because thanks to the help provided he will be able to have the renovation and general maintenance that his motorcycle taxi needs. This way, Cesar will have his vehicle in top condition and he will be able to keep providing his services. Therefore, he will keep working to achieve his dream of having his own car.

loans.use: in the renovation and general maintenance of his motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Ola

texts.en: Ola is a friendly middle-aged woman. She has 35 years old. She got married many years ago and has three children. She’s really proud of her family and ready to do her best to be able to offer them a respectable life.  Since their marriage, Ola’s husband used to manage the family expenses and still does. And since Ola noticed that their income do not satisfy their needs, she decided to open her own clothing shop. She sells a wide variety of clothes from which she earns a fair amount of money daily. To better develop her work, she’s requesting today a loan from Kiva Partner Vitas s.a.l. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more merchandise for her business, such as pants, t-shirts, lingerie, and many other items. This will allow her to offer a greater variety of products and thus improve her income.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her business, such as pants, t-shirts, lingerie, and many other items

loans.name: Annie

texts.en: Annie is a friendly Lebanese woman. She is 25 years-old and lives with her father and two siblings. She’s really proud of her family and ready to do her best to be able to offer them a respectable life. Since she noticed that her father’s income does not satisfy their needs, she decided to open her own lingerie shop with the small amount of money she already has. She sells a wide variety of women's lingerie from which she earns a fair amount of money daily. To better develop her work, she’s requesting today a youth loan from Kiva Partner Vitas s.a.l. She will be utilizing the loan to enlarge her business by adding diverse items to it. This will allow her to offer a greater variety of products and thus improve her income.

loans.use: to enlarge her business by adding diverse items to it.

loans.name: Bashorat

texts.ru: Башорату 51 года. Она добрая и толерантная женщина. Башорат за мужем и имеет 1 ребенка, которому 16 лет. Башорат еще в молодости научилась у портнихи шить женские одежды. Она обучилась в Педагогическом Университете. Данное время она работает в средней школе учительницей. Она получает маленькую зарплату, которая не хватает для обеспечения семьи. Она хочет организовать свой бизнес шитьем женской одежды. Она должна упорно работать и получать больше дохода, так как ее муж без рабочий и со всеми расходами Башорат справляется сама. Она обучилась в курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых  женщин и получила сертификат. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 сомони для покупки тканей для организации нового бизнеса. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Bashorat is 51 years old, married, and has one 16-year-old child. She is a kind and tolerant woman. When she was young, she studied with seamstresses who taught her how to sew women's clothing. She also graduated from the Pedagogical University. She currently works as a high school teacher, but her salary is very low and is not sufficient to provide for her family. She wants to set up her own business sewing women's clothing. She has to work very hard and earn a good income because her husband is unemployed, so she needs to cover all expenses herself. She took a course entitled "To Get Ahead" that was organised by the Association of Businesswomen, and for which she earned a certificate. She is seeking a loan of 1,000 Tajikistan Somoni to purchase fabrics so she can establish her business. She is waiting for your kindness.

loans.use: To buy fabrics for to set up a new business

loans.name: Durdona

texts.ru: Дурдоне 34 года. Она замужем, но не имеет детей. Она живет вместе с мужем в сельской местности. Дурдона уже более 12 лет занимается выращиванием сельхоз культуры, как картофель, морковь, ячмень и т.п. Ее муж помогает ей введение бизнеса. Она хочет развивать бизнес, увеличить доход и таким образом получить шанс помочь бездомным детям. Она очень любит детей и желает им добра. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 6000 сомони для покупки минерального удобрения и семена для развития сельхоз бизнеса. Она ждет вашу доброту и обещает погасить займ во время.
texts.en: Durdona is 34 years old. She is married but does not have children. She and her husband live in a rural area. For over 12 years, she has been earning a living by growing crops like potatoes, carrots, barley, and so on. Her husband helps in her work. She now wants to develop her business and increase her income, which will give her the opportunity to help homeless children. She really loves kids and wishes the best for them. Durdona is seeking a loan of 6,000 Tajikistan Somoni to purchase mineral fertilizers and seeds for the development of her agricultural business. She is waiting for your kindness and promises to pay back her loan on time.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Rafael Julian

texts.es:
Rafael es un hombre de 41 años, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Imperial con su esposa y sus 2 hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad que tuvo de trabajar desde muy joven, Rafael no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Agronomía, en sus ratos libres le gusta dedicar un poco de tiempo a la lectura y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Ceviche para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Rafael trabaja como obrero de campo en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, adicionalmente trabaja con el apoyo de su esposa vendiendo sandias, Rafael trabaja todos  los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su responsabilidad y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Rafael se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una vitrina y una mesa, las cuales le servirán de mucho para acondicionar su negocio de venta de sandias, de esta manera Rafael podrá brindar un mejor servicios y atenderá a mas clientes, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de terminar la construcción de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Rafael, 41, lives in the city of Cañete, in the Imperial District, together with his wife and two childen who he loves very much and who are his main motivation in life.  He is a very kind, hard-working, enthusiastic person who, alongside his wife, dedicates all his efforts to providing for the family.  Unfortunately, due to a lack of economic resources and the need to start work from a very early age, Rafael was unable to get a degree in Agronomy.  In his free time he likes to read and, sometimes, cooks a delicious Ceviche to share with family.

On his own initiative and with much tenacity and dedication, Rafael works as a field worker on a farm in his city.  He also helps his wife sell watermelons.  Rafael works every day for approximately ten hours; and he believes things are going well because of his responsibility and kindness toward others.

Rafael is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to their help he will be able to buy a display case and table to fix up his watermelon stall.  This will allow Rafael to provide better customer service and continue working toward his goal of finishing the construction of his house.

loans.use: To buy a display case and table.

loans.name: Jhonatan Octavio

texts.es:
Jhonatan es un joven de 19 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Pisco con sus padres y hermanos, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Jhonatan pudo estudiar una pequeña carrera técnica de Electricidad, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Jhonatan trabaja como chofer de mototaxi, brindando servicios de transporte en su ciudad, él trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por su responsabilidad y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Jhonatan se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de un pequeño puesto de ventas en el mercado central de su ciudad, en el cual brindará servicios de reparación de artefactos eléctricos, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su propia empresa.
texts.en:
Jhonatan is 19, single, and lives in the city of Pisco with his parents and siblings.  He is a very kind, hard-working, enthusiastic person who is determined to get ahead.   Through his own efforts and with the support of his parents, Jhonatan was able to study to be an electric technician.  In his free time, he enjoys playing soccer; and sometimes he cooks a delicious chicken and rice to share with family.

On his own initiative, and with much effort and dedication, Jhonatan works as a motortaxi driver in the city.  He works an average 12 hours a day and believes business is going well because he is responsible and kind toward others.

Jhonatan is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to their help, he will be able to buy a small sales stall in the central market of the city.  There he plans to offer repair services for electric applicances.  This will allow him to continue working toward his goal of having his own company.

loans.use: To buy a sales stall.

loans.name: Rafael Antonio

texts.es: Don Rafael de 37 años de edad se dedica al cultivo de maiz y frijol, vive con su esposa y sus 4 hijos de 8, 10, 11 y 13 años, es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarles lo mejor a sus hijos, esta solicitando un credito para poder comprar fertilizantes y herramientas para su cultivo de maiz y frijol, para poder seguir dandole el sustento diario a su familia y poder solventar todos los gastos de su hogar.
texts.en: Rafael, 37, lives with his wife and four children, ages 8, 10, 11 and 13.  He grows corn and beans for a living.  He is a very hard-working, responsible person regarding his household obligations and is known for giving his children the best he can.  He is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers and tools for his corn and bean crops.  This is so he can continue providing for his family on a daily basis and take care of household expenses.

loans.use: To buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a computer for his locksmithing business.

loans.name: Mario Israel

texts.es: Don Mario se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años siembra frijol y maiz y con las ventas que realiza de sus cosechas a la agencias de granos basicos logra solventar los gastos que tiene en su hogar, es un hombre responsable, honesto y trabajador vive con su esposa y sus 2 hijos. El esta solicitando un credito para poder comprar insumos para su cosecha ya que con lo que gana no le alcanza para cubrir esos gastos y asi tener mejores ingresos y tener un mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en: Mario has been a farmer for several years growing beans and corn.  With the money he makes from selling his crops to the basic grain agencies, he is able to cover household expenses.  He is a responsible, honest, hard-working man who lives with his wife and two children.  He is requesting a loan to buy farm supplies for his crops since the money he earns is not enough to cover these expenses.   This will allow him to improve his income and achieve more economic stability.

loans.use: To buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Emir

texts.es: Emir tiene 38 años de edad, su compañera le ayuda en el negocio, la cual consiste en la compra y venta de de cemento que va a vender fuera de Managua, con estos ingresos ayuda a sus cuatro hijos para que estudien y no les falte lo primordial la alimentación. Esta es la primera vez que Emir está solicitando crédito con Afodenic, para construir un segundo piso en su casa de habitación, para esto necesita comprar laminas de zinc, perlines, plycem para las divisiones, cemento, arena, bloques, hierro entre otros materiales, esto le permitirá más comodidad para vivir con su hermosa familia.
texts.en:
Emir is 38 years old. He works together with his partner buying cement and selling it outside Managua and this is how he pays for his four children’s food and education.

This is Emir’s first loan with AFODENIC; he is planning to build a second floor in his house and he needs to buy zinc sheets, beams, panels for the divisions, cement, sand, bricks and iron, among other materials. This will give him and his beautiful family a more comfortable place where to live.

loans.use: to buy building materials like zinc sheets, cement, sand, bricks and iron.

loans.name: Yolanda Cecilia

texts.es: Doña Yolanda de 33 años se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace 12 años cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ventas que realiza ha podido sacar adelante a su familia ya que le genera buenas ganancias, vive con su esposo y su hijo en casa propia, Yolanda solicita credito para poder comprar mas mercaderia ( pantalones, camisas, blusas, ropa para bebe, etc) y asi surtir mas su venta y seguir teniendo mejores ganancias para poder seguir manteniendo su estabilidad economica como hasta ahora.
texts.en: Yolanda is 33 years old. She has sold clothing for 12 years close to her residence. With the sales she has been able to get her family ahead, because they bring in good earnings. She lives with her husband and son in a home they own.Yolanda is asking for this loan to be able to buy more merchandise (pants, shirts, blouses, baby clothes, etc.). This way, she can stock her store and continue to have better earnings to be able to keep maintaining financial security, as she has so far.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (clothing).

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es: Doña Maribel de 46 años de edad se dedica a la siembra de maiz y frijol desde hace varios años, es una mujer  muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarle lo mejor a sus hijos. Actualmente vive junto a su esposo y sus 5 hijo. Desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso a solicitado un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, entre otras cosas, para seguir llevando el pan de cada dia a su hogar.
texts.en: Maribel is 46 years old. She has grown corn and beans for several years. She is very responsible with her home, as she has always been described as giving the best to her children. Right now, she lives with her husband and 5 children. She wants to increase her sales and to do that she has asked for a loan which will allow her to buy: seeds, fertilizer and more, so she can keep bringing home the daily bread.

loans.use: to buy farming materials.

loans.name: Jose Domingo

texts.es: don José de 30 años de edad vive con su esposa y sus 2 hijos; él se dedica a la agricultura siembra de maíz y frijol y tiene de respaldo la siembra de café ya lleva varios años de trabajar en este rubro, el comercia en los alrededores de la zona. José es un hombre responsable y trabajador quiere aumentar sus ganancias pero necesita invertir en insumos por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar semillas, fertilizantes, herramientas, etc. y asi darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en: José is 30 years old. He lives with his wife and 2 children. He is a farmer and grows corn and beans. He also has the backup of a coffee crop. He has done this work for several years. He works on the outskirts of town. José is a responsible and hardworking man who wants to increase his earnings, but he needs to invest in materials. To do that he is asking for a loan that will allow him to buy seeds, fertilizer, tools, etc., and thus give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy farming materials.

loans.name: Jaqueline

texts.en: Jaqueline is 27 years old and single. She lives in Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur. She owns and operates a food vending business selling foods such as viand in the local community to earn a living. She has been in her business for over 3 years and earns 8,000 PHP every month. She joined GDMPC in 2011, and now she has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase additional food to sell such as pork meat. Her plan is to use the additional revenue generated to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional food to sell such as pork meat.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build an enclosing wall.

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is 54 years old with three school aged children from the village of Ugad, in the province of Isabela. She is very patient person and she makes sure to do what she can to meet the needs of her family. And for that reason, she is asking for a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy feed and vitamins to use in her hog raising business.
In the future, Lorna hopes that she can renovate their house to have better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins to use in  her hog raising business.

loans.name: Arlyn

texts.en:
Arlyn is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business selling purified drinking water in the Philippines.
She is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to buy more drinking water.
Arlyn successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.
NWTF is re-listing Arlyn's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more drinking water to sell to customers.

loans.name: Jenifer

texts.en: Jenifer's business is sari-sari store. She is 46 years old now and happily married with three children. Jenifer and her family live in the village of Caloacan. She has been in this business for 14 years and usually earns about PHP 300 a day. Jenifer is asking for a loan of PHP 12,000 to buy grocery items such as condiments, soap and beverages to sell. She hopes to grow her business with the help of this loan.

loans.use: to buy grocery items such as condiments, soap and beverages to sell

loans.name: Loreta

texts.en: Loreta is 29 years old and married to a field technician that works for an agricultural company. The couple is blessed with two children. She owns and operates a retail store in their village and has done so for almost 9 years. In this business she's earning a net income of PHP 5,000 a month. She would like take out a loan for PHP 20,000 to purchase beverages, canned goods, noodles, coffee, sugar, and biscuits. She's hoping that her requested loan will be granted immediately so that she can utilize it in her business.

loans.use: to purchase beverages, canned goods, noodles, coffee, sugar, and biscuits.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en: Gloria is 53 years old, and married with 3 children. She lives in Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur. She owns and operates a retail business in the local community to earn a living. She has been doing so for over 10 years and earns 5,000 PHP every month. She joined GDMPC in 2009, and now has requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to purchase additional products to sell like canned goods, coffee, sugar and eggs. Her plan is to use the additional revenue generated to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell like canned goods, coffee, sugar and eggs.

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita is 63 years old, widowed with eight children. She lives in Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur. She owns and operates a retail business in the local community to earn a living. She has been in her business for over 10 years and earns 8,000 PHP every month. 

She joined GDMPC in the year 2008, and now she has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase additional products to sell such as canned goods, shampoo, soap and eggs. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell such as canned goods, shampoo, soap and eggs.

loans.name: Leonely

texts.en:
Leonely, 34 years old, is married to a farmer, and they are blessed with three children. She has owned and operated a retail store in their village for almost three years. With this business she's earning a net income of PHP 2,500 a month. 

She would like to avail herself of a loan amounting to PHP 10,000 to purchase sugar, coffee, cooking oil, and detergent soaps. She's hoping that her requested loan will be granted so that she can utilize it in her business to gain more income.

loans.use: To purchase sugar, coffee, cooking oil, and detergent soaps.

loans.name: Brenda

texts.en: Brenda is 46 years old and married with 4 children. She lives in Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur. She owns and operates a fish vending business in the local community to earn a living. She has been in her business for over 6 years and earns 10,000 PHP every month. She joined GDMPC since the year 2011, and now she has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP to purchase additional fish to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to sell.

loans.name: Shima Group

texts.fr:
Joséphine  fait partie du groupe Shima et   habite à Ruyigi. Elle  a 30 ans et est mariée à Déo, un chauffeur. Ensemble ils ont  4 enfants  dont 3 étudient.

Elle  fait le commerce de boutique (riz, haricot, sel,…)  depuis  8 ans. 

Elle est à son  cinquième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup d’articles de sa boutique (riz, haricot, sel,…) à revendre, pour gagner plus. 

Le gain de son commerce lui permet de nourrir la famille et payer les frais scolaires des enfants.
texts.en:
Josephine is a member of the Shima group and lives in Ruyigi. She is 30 years old and is married to Deo, a driver. Together they have four children, of whom three go to school. 

Josephine has been selling goods (rice, beans, salt...) out of a shop for eight years. This is her fifth loan with Turame. With this Kiva loan, she is going to increase her capital to buy a large number of goods to resell in her shop, in order to earn more. 

The income from this business allows her to feed her family and pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy goods to resell

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina is 31 years old and is married with two school-aged children. Marcelina is diligent person, she makes sure that she can provide for the needs of her family. 

Marcelina is asking for a loan to buy canned goods, snack foods, spices and drinks for her store to have additional income so that she can give her family a good quality of living. She hope that she can expand her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snack foods, spices and drinks for her store.

loans.name: Elma

texts.en: This time, Elma is borrowing PHP 29,500 to fund her meat-vending business. The soft-drinks retail business that she previously funded through NWTF and Kiva, continue to provide Elma and her family the opportunity to increase their income and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy meat to sell on her food stall.

loans.name: Rolando

texts.en:
Rolando is a hog-raiser in the village of Centro 1, Angadanan. He is 51 years old. He is happily married to Delia. The couple is thankful because they have been blessed with three children. 

As of now, Rolando wants to have more piglets to raise, but he lack the necessary capital. In this regard, Rolando is asking for a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy additional piglets to raise as well as the feed for them. He hopes that he can obtain his desired loan to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets to raise as well as the feed for them.

loans.name: Laidou Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe   LAIDOU  est constitué de 4  femmes toutes mariées ayant une moyenne d’âge de 26 ans et 4 enfants. Elles vivent  dans des  familles traditionnelles élargies dans le quartier Heremakono Nord de la ville de Bougouni. 
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, d’amitié et de commerce. Pour renforcer leur capacité financière afin de mieux faire leur commerce, elles ont adhéré à l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso avec laquelle elles sont à leur huitième prêt. Les sept  précédents prêts ont été correctement remboursés. Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce de   fruits et légumes à l’image de KADIA qui est la présidente de l’association,  assise en première position de la droite vers la gauche. Elle fait l’achat vente de fruits et légumes  et compte acheter avec son  prêt,  2 paniers d’avocat avec les grossistes venant de la côte d’ivoire. Elle effectue ses ventes au marché  et à domicile, en détail au comptant et à crédit  à une clientèle composée essentiellement de femmes. 
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 20.000FCFA qui sera  investi dans les activités et rembourser le prêt.
texts.en:
The Laidou group is made up of four women, who are all married and who, on average, are 26 years old and have four children. They live in traditional, extended families in the Heremakono Nord neighborhood in the town of Bougouni. They know each other through neighborhood, friendship, and business ties. 

To increase their financial capacity in order to better conduct their businesses, they joined the mico-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their eighth loan. Their seven previous loans have all been correctly repaid. 

This group of women sells fruits and vegetables. Kadia, the president of the group, is the one seated first on the right in the photo. She buys and sells fruits and vegetables and hopes to buy two racks of avocados from the wholesalers coming from Côte d'Ivoire. She makes her sales in a market and from her home, for cash and credit to customers who are mostly women. 

Kadia hopes to earn an average monthly profit of 20,000 francs CFA, which will be used to reinvest in the businesses and to repay the loan.

loans.use: to buy fruits

loans.name: Jonalyn

texts.en: Jonalyn is 34 years old and is married to Herman, a father who is engaged inthe  agricultural business. The couple is thankful because they have been blessed with four children. Aside from the agricultural business, Jonalyn is engaged in her sari-sari store. She has been in this business for 15 years. She usually earns about 350 PHP a day. For this store, Jonalyn is asking a loan in the amount of 50,000 PHP to buy canned goods, noodles, soap, beverages, assorted breads and condiments to sell. She hopes that she can obtain her desired loan to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, noodles, soap, beverages, assorted breads and condiments to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy products for selling food

loans.name: Behzod

texts.ru: Бехзоду 32 года. Он женат на прекрасной женщине, которая помогает ему введение бизнеса. Они не имеют детей. Бехзод более 15 лет занимается скотоводством и земледелием. Он в основном выращивает пшеницу, морковь и картофель. Другого источника дохода у него нет, так как он живет в сельской местности. В этом году не смог взять хороший урожай и поэтому он хочет дальнейшем развивать скотоводство, так как скотоводство имеет мало риска, чем земледелие. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки скота. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Bekhod is 32, and is married to a wonderful woman who helps him run his business. They don't have any children. Bekhod has been involved in animal husbandry and farming for more than 15 years. He mainly grows wheat, carrots, and potatoes. Because he lives in a rural area, this is his only source of income. This year he was unable to get a good harvest, and so he wants to expand the livestock side of the business, which is less risky than farming. He is seeking a loan in the amount of 2000 somons to buy cattle. He awaits your kind assistance.

loans.use: To buy cattle

loans.name: Marina Estela

texts.es: Doña Marina de 50 años de edas vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos los cuales 2 dependen de ella, es comerciante junto con su esposo tiene un puesto de comida desde hace 25 años cerca de su lugar de residencia, tiene muy buena clientela, su hija sale a repartir los platos de comida que le encargan sus clientes, ella solicita credito para poder comprar mas mercaderia y poder seguir adelante con su negocio y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Marina, 50, lives with her husband and her three children, two of whom are dependent on her.  She and her husband are merchants.  She has had a food stall near her house for 25 years.  She has very good customers.  Her daughter goes out to distribute the plates of food that her customers order.

She's requesting a loan to be able to buy more merchandise so she can get ahead with her business and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy products for her restaurant

loans.name: 02.03.07 Đông Hải Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hải has a business sewing clothes. She is requesting a loan to purchase fabrics for her sewing business.

Hải is 30 years old and married with two children.

Hải is the group leader of the 02.03.07 Đông Hải solidarity group, which consists of six members. 

She lives and works in the city of Thanh Hoa, an urban area in the province of Thanh Hoa.

This is Hải's first loan with the Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women.

Hải has been involved in this business for five years.

One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is a lack of capital.

With her business profits, Hải hopes for her family to be healthy and happy. She also hopes for her children to do well in school and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics for her sewing business.

loans.name: Joel

texts.en: Joel is 36 years old and married with two school-age children. Joel is a very hardworking father. He is asking for a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy feed and piglets. Aside from his hog-raising business, he is also engaged in farming. Joel dreams that his business will expand some day so that he can provide everything that is family needs.

loans.use: to buy feed and piglets for his hog-raising business.

loans.name: 01.06.03 Đông Sơn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Nhung has a retail business selling dry food. She is requesting a loan to purchase dry food to resell.

Nhung is 58 years old and married with three children.
